title: Gifting?
body:
I'm getting a RP card this Wednesday buuuuut i'm just so impatient.

If any of you guys want to donate to a poor guy.

I'd appreciate it!

replies.body: I have 8 $50 RP cards on my desk, if you left out the fact you were gonna buy one and ask nicely I may have dropped you one, but you're a greedy mofo and you ain't getting none of my RP.
You might want to use those before our RP amount gets lower per dollar due to our currency.
may I please have one kind sir :) I'm a poor humble young man, who doesn't have the money to buy RP, It was my birthday a few days ago as well :)

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1lE4dqb5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-09T12:07:34.581+0000)
>
> I have 8 $50 RP cards on my desk, if you left out the fact you were gonna buy one and ask nicely I may have dropped you one, but you're a greedy mofo and you ain't getting none of my RP.

ur such a troll XD

Just a question.

How much does $50 RP give you?

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1lE4dqb5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-10T11:02:55.758+0000)
>
> Just a question.
> 
> How much does $50 RP give you?

3150 if I recall right.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=1lE4dqb5,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-10T15:04:00.592+0000)
>
> 3150 if I recall right.

isent it 5900?

Ah tyvm.

I was hoping to get Rek'Sai and some others skins and save 975RP for Bard.

mmm well I have a feeling with australias current state (I assume that's where you're playing from, correct me if im wrong) no one will have the money to spare. 

government keeps poking holes in our pockets
